articles.title: TikTok to invest $1.5B in GoTo’s Indonesia e-commerce business Tokopedia - TechCrunch
articles.description: ByteDance's TikTok wants to do more business in Indonesia -- Southeast Asia's biggest e-commerce market. So after facing roadblocks from the regulators,
articles.content: ByteDance’s TikTok wants to do more business in Indonesia — Southeast Asia’s biggest e-commerce market. So after facing roadblocks from the regulators, it’s now come up with a new route to get there.… [+3534 chars]
